title: Mark Bowden: "The Steal"
description: Michael speaks with author Mark Bowden, with his book "The Steal: The Attempt to Overturn the 2020 Election and the People Who Stopped It." Original air date 26 January 2022. The book was published on 4 January 2022.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Mark Bowden)
